attributes.action: STOP PLAN FOR BRIGHTON i360 TOWER
attributes.additional_details:
Brighton and Hove city council have given the go ahead to build a £46million and 175-metre viewing tower and visitors centre on the old site of the West Pier, gambling with taxpayers money, interrupting our beautiful horizon and countless other nasties.

There are infinite alternatives for this site!

Sign now for a cheaper, greener, less obtrusive and more exciting community project and oppose the construction of another one hit wonder!!!
